XTft Struct Reference

#include <xtft.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This structure is the base for whole of the operations that are to be performed on the TFT screen. With this we will get a handle to the driver through which we access different members like base address, deviceID and using them we navigate, fill colors etc.
